channel.title: Hugo on xenol's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on xenol's blog

item.title: Migration from Octopress to Hugo
item.description: After a while, my blog finally received love it deserved. The biggest change is that I migrated the blog from Octopress to Hugo, which is a fast static site generator written in Go. The overall feeling stayed the same, but the blog maintenance is much easier for me. I am still finding my way around Hugo, but so far it works nicely. Another change is that this site is being hosted on Github Pages. So, as the website was refreshed, we might concentrate more on blogging. Happy reading!
